attributes.action: Community first responders should awarded ambulance service long service medals
attributes.background: To give long service awards to volunteer Cfr’s same as paid staff ie long service medals currently this is prevented by ambulance trusts

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that ask for someone to be given an honour.

The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
